events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product does not match the description on your website.
The system has classified this customer issue as a refund request based on the keywords detected in the message.
This case has been assigned to agent Lisa Thompson for further assistance regarding the refund inquiry.
Hello, this is Lisa from customer support. I understand you'd like to request a refund, and I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and explain the reason why you want a refund in more detail?
My order number is 12345678. The product I got looks very different from the pictures, and it doesn't work as described.
Thank you for the details. We will start the refund process immediately and you will receive your money back within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response. I appreciate the prompt refund and hope to shop with you again in the future.
The refund has been confirmed and processed successfully. Please allow up to 5 business days for it to appear back on your payment method.
We are following up to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the refund has been successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your cooperation.
